jobDescription:
Our healthcare product client is looking for multiple year experienced C++ Software Engineer professional to join their team on a long-term consulting contract.  

These individuals will be responsible for owning and programming components in Device Management & Systems Controls Software teams.  They will join a team and own a component, feature or a feature set.  They will apply principles of SDLC, Agile methodologies and Continuous Integration as well as perform software troubleshooting and investigations of components and features.   This team works on software platform goals for hardware abstraction and detector communications.

 

The ideal candidate will have experience with the following: 

 

Multiple years of professional experience in software engineering and application development professional experience in software development
Proven hands-on experience with object-oriented programming languages, including C++ as a primary language
Experience working on Linux based platforms
Working knowledge in configuration management tools
Python, shell and Bash scripting experience
Skilled in core data structures and algorithms
Software Platforming Experience
Medical Device Software Development Experience is a plus
Engineering project management experience with Agile Teams
Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent
